fileSamples.statement:
⦗W⦘ ⨾ (sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ (rf ⨾ rmw)＊
⊆ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ (sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)＊).
fileSamples.proofString:
hahn_frame.
rewrite rtE at 1; relsf.
apply inclusion_union_l.
rewrite rtE at 1; relsf.
basic_solver.
unionR right.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘; rels.
arewrite (rf ⨾ rmw ⊆ (sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw) at 1 by basic_solver 12.
rewrite ct_begin.
generalize (@sb_same_loc_trans G); ins; rewrite !seqA; relsf.
generalize (ct_begin ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)).
basic_solver 40.

fileSamples.statement:
(sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘
  ∪ (⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ∪ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)⁺).
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement:
(H : transitive (sb ∩ same_loc)) : (sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw ⨾ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)＊
⊆ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)＊.
fileSamples.proofString:
generalize (ct_begin ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)).
basic_solver 40.

fileSamples.statement:
(H : transitive (sb ∩ same_loc)) : ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)⁺
≡ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw) ⨾ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)＊ ->
(sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw ⨾ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)＊
⊆ ((sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rf ⨾ rmw)＊.
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver 40.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗Rel⦘ ⨾ (⦗F⦘ ⨾ sb)^? ⨾ s_rs ⊆ ⦗Rel⦘ ⨾ (⦗F⦘ ⨾ sb)^? ⨾ rs.
fileSamples.proofString: by rewrite s_rs_in_rs.

fileSamples.statement:
s_release ⨾ rf ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Acq⦘
⊆ release ⨾ (rfi ∪ (sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rfe) ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Acq⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite s_release_in_release.
rewrite (rfi_union_rfe).
basic_solver 21.

fileSamples.statement:
release ⨾ rf ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Acq⦘
⊆ release ⨾ (rfi ∪ (sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rfe) ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Acq⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (rfi_union_rfe).
basic_solver 21.

fileSamples.statement:
release ⨾ (rfi ∪ rfe) ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Acq⦘
⊆ release ⨾ (rfi ∪ (sb ∩ same_loc)^? ⨾ rfe) ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Acq⦘.
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver 21.

fileSamples.statement: (sb ∪ s_sw)⁺ ⊆ (sb ∪ sw)⁺.
fileSamples.proofString: by rewrite s_sw_in_sw.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) (COMP : complete G) : imm_hb.coherence G -> irreflexive (s_hb ⨾ eco^?).
fileSamples.proofString:
unfolder; ins; desf.
eapply imm_hb.hb_irr; eauto.
eapply s_hb_in_hb; edone.
unfold imm_hb.coherence in *; unfolder in *.
eapply H; eexists; split; eauto.
eapply s_hb_in_hb; edone.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) (COMP : complete G) (H : imm_hb.coherence G) (x : actid) (H0 : s_hb x x) : False.
fileSamples.proofString:
eapply imm_hb.hb_irr; eauto.
eapply s_hb_in_hb; edone.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) (COMP : complete G) (H : imm_hb.coherence G) (x z : actid) (H0 : s_hb x z) (H1 : eco z x) : False.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold imm_hb.coherence in *; unfolder in *.
eapply H; eexists; split; eauto.
eapply s_hb_in_hb; edone.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) (COMP : complete G) (H : forall x0 : actid, (exists z0 : actid, hb x0 z0 /\ eco z0 x0) -> False) (x z : actid) (H0 : s_hb x z) (H1 : eco z x) : False.
fileSamples.proofString:
eapply H; eexists; split; eauto.
eapply s_hb_in_hb; edone.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) (COMP : complete G) (H : forall x0 : actid, (exists z0 : actid, hb x0 z0 /\ eco z0 x0) -> False) (x z : actid) (H0 : s_hb x z) (H1 : eco z x) : hb x z.
fileSamples.proofString: eapply s_hb_in_hb; edone.
